org.openimaj.image.pixel.sampling

Class RectangleSampler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.pixel.sampling.RectangleSampler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<Rectangle>

    public class RectangleSampler
extends Object
implements Iterable<Rectangle>
    A RectangleSampler provides an easy way to generate a sliding window of rectangle over an image or other domain.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Constructor Detail

      • RectangleSampler

        public RectangleSampler(float minx,
                        float maxx,
                        float miny,
                        float maxy,
                        float stepx,
                        float stepy,
                        float width,
                        float height)
        Construct the sampler with the given parameters
        Parameters:
        minx - starting x-ordinate
        maxx - finishing x-ordinate
        miny - starting y-ordinate
        maxy - finishing y-ordinate
        stepx - step size in x direction
        stepy - step size in y direction
        width - width of sample window
        height - height of sample window

      • RectangleSampler

        public RectangleSampler(Rectangle bounds,
                        float stepx,
                        float stepy,
                        float width,
                        float height)
        Construct the sampler with the given parameters
        Parameters:
        bounds - the bounds in which the window must remain; it will start in the top-left corner
        stepx - step size in x direction
        stepy - step size in y direction
        width - width of sample window
        height - height of sample window

      • RectangleSampler

        public RectangleSampler(Image<?,?> img,
                        float stepx,
                        float stepy,
                        float width,
                        float height)
        Construct the sampler with the given parameters
        Parameters:
        img - the image from which to set the sampler bounds (will be set to the complete image)
        stepx - step size in x direction
        stepy - step size in y direction
        width - width of sample window
        height - height of sample window

        Adjust the bounds of the sampler
        Parameters:
        r - the new bounds rectangle

        public void setBounds(Image<?,?> img)
        Adjust the bounds of the sampler
        Parameters:

        public List<Rectangle> allRectangles()
        Get a list of all the rectangles that can be produced by this sampler

      • subImageIterator

        public <I extends Image<?,I>> Iterator<I> subImageIterator(I image)
        Create an iterator to extract sub-images from an image based on the rectangles defined by this sampler.
        Parameters:
        image - the image to extract from
        Returns:
        an iterator over the extracted sub-images.
